author: Russell Brand
description:
Church attendance is rising, people are turning to Jesus—and even Bill Maher is questioning atheism. Russell explores a surprising conversation between Maher and Charlie Kirk on faith, the resurrection, and the Shroud of Turin. Is a spiritual revival underway as globalism fades? And can even the most unlikely skeptics rediscover the divine? Blending irreverent comedy with transcendent questions, this episode dives deep into the mystery of belief.

title: Moment Bill Maher Makes STUNNING ADMISSION
